root: ^I'm a spirit lingering around, and I've got something cool to show you
^Just Hold down, jump with space, and press 'C' mid-air
^You'll shoot a bit of sticky slime below and give yourself a boost upward.
^It's like nature's own elevator, I tell you.
^Try it out in this empty room. See that platform up there? Give the Sticky Boost Jump a go and reach new heights!
